auditorium

Class RSACrypto

  • java.lang.Object
    • auditorium.RSACrypto

  • public class RSACrypto
extends java.lang.Object
    Crypto primitives used in auditorium are wrapped here.

    • Method Detail

      • sign

        public Signature sign(ASExpression data,
             Key key)
               throws AuditoriumCryptoException
        Create an RSA digital signature.
        Parameters:
        data - Sign this expression's verbatim form.
        key - Use this key to create the signature.
        Returns:
        This method returns the signature data.
        Throws:
        AuditoriumCryptoException

      • verify

        public void verify(Signature signature,
          Cert host)
            throws AuditoriumCryptoException
        Verify that an RSA digital signature (possibly created by the sign function) came from a particular host.
        Parameters:
        signature - This is the digital signature, itself.
        host - This is the certificate of the host that supposedly signed the message.
        Throws:
        AuditoriumCryptoException
